solution_line_template: The total spent on both pairs of jeans was ${total_cost} - ${coat_cost} - ${shoes_cost} = $<<{total_cost}-{coat_cost}-{shoes_cost}={cost_of_two_jeans}>>{cost_of_two_jeans}.
One pair of jeans would cost ${cost_of_two_jeans} / {number_of_jeans_pairs} = $<<{cost_of_two_jeans}/{number_of_jeans_pairs}={cost_of_one_pair_of_jeans}>>{cost_of_one_pair_of_jeans}.
